backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage, access control, maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, activities, and related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI layout change to LilyPage and listing affected file, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files, used as a reference for build planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app with root element and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global theme provider, and app-level layout and notifications.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using bookmark state from useBookmarks and stopping click propagation.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, navigation links, user avatar, create menu, and mobile interactions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with header and footer and manages mobile left sidebar drawer state.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main left navigation sidebar with links, active-state icons, and recent activity items.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post card with avatar, metadata, image handling, and like/share/bookmark actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a slide-in mobile drawer containing the LeftSidebar and manages body scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for pond pages with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user ribbit entry showing avatar, comment content, metadata, and link to the related lily.
File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a threaded ribbit with avatar, content, like/reply actions, and nested indentation.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using query hooks and memoized calculations.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile fullscreen search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with interactive input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown under search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar module displaying top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats using reusable components.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Thin wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger adding underline-themed styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions for mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Hook that tracks whether a media query currently matches via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for ponds, memberships, users, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables, themes, and utility classes for global styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility to format large numbers into short forms like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF handling and canvas-based output.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric rules with error helpers.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and provides error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase storage, hashing, backups, and restoration via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines using static text and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all ponds with loading states, join status, and a link to create a new pond.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating lilies with support for text, images, links, tag suggestions, pond selection, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with validation, image uploads, compression, previews, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Shows a frog user's profile, avatar, stats, and tabs for their posts and ribbits with loading and notâ€‘found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main feed with trending/new sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily post, handles loading data, view count increments, sorting ribbits, and posting replies.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, and join/leave functionality with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond's feed of lilies, handles join status, sorting, and loading skeletons with sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lilies, handles missing posts, and allows removing bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats, loading states, and navigation to each tag.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: React page that manages user settings including username changes, avatar upload/compression, Froggy Phrase handling, profile saving, pond membership, and admin tag tools using many hooks and UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the goal to align lily page layout elements and tracking related features and requests.
